titleStmt.title: Satisfaction concerning mixt Communions: in answer to the doubts of some, who abstain from the sacrament of the Lords Supper; because wicked persons are present.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Raworth for Samuel Gellibrand, and are to be sold at his Shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the Brazen Serpent,

notesStmt.note: reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his Shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the Brazen Serpent
